接口 ResizableExecutor

    public interface ResizableExecutor
extends Executor

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int getActiveCount()
      Returns the approximate number of threads that are actively executing tasks.
      int getMaxThreads() 
      int getPoolSize()
      Returns the current number of threads in the pool.
